items.sentence: I wish that I could speak French more fluently.
Did Tom tell you anything about where he works?
Tom got up and walked nonchalantly to the door.
Tom smiled nonchalantly and didn't say a thing.
I'm sure this book will be of great use to you.
There are more than three thousand people here.
Lake Geneva is the largest lake in Switzerland.
It never occurred to me that Tom might be sick.
On a hot day, a cold beer really hits the spot.
It would be wise to get Tom to do that for you.
